id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset.

source_id.description: Original id in the source dataset, not used to link objects in this dataset.

region_id.description: Id of the region containing this building

subregion_id.description: Id of the subregion if the region is divided into multiple subregions.

taxlot_id.description: Id of the taxlot that this feature is located on.

analysis_ids.description: Ids of analyses associated with this feature.

current_datapoint_id.description: Id of the datapoint representing current state of this building.

geojson_id.description: Id of the geojson for this feature

legal_name.description: Legal name used to identify this feature.

building_number.description: Index of building on taxlot if there are multiple buildings on taxlot.

number_of_stories.description: The maximum number of building stories

number_of_stories_above_ground.description: The maximum number of building stories above ground

number_of_stories_below_ground.description: The maximum number of building stories below ground

number_of_residential_units.description: Total number of residential units in the building.

year_built.description: The year construction of the building was completed

structure_type.description: The predominant construction method used to build the structure.

structure_condition.description: The general condition of the structure.

average_roof_height.description: Average height of the roof relative to surface elevation (m)

maximum_roof_height.description: Maximum height of the roof relative to surface elevation (m)

minimum_roof_height.description: Minimum height of the roof relative to surface elevation (m)

surface_elevation.description: The surface elevation (above NAVD88 datum) of the building (m)

roof_elevation.description: The maximum roof elevation (above NAVD88 datum) of the building (m)

window_to_wall_ratio.description: Ratio of exterior window area to exterior wall area.

intersecting_building_ids.description: Ids of other buildings which are in contact with this building

surrounding_building_ids.description: Ids of other buildings which are close enough to ths building to include in shading calculations

stories.description: Information about each story in the building

measured_energy_use.description: Historical measured energy use for this building.

story_number.description: First above ground floor is story 1, first below ground floor is 0, second below ground floor is -1

floor_to_floor_height.description: Floor to floor height of this story (m)

window_to_wall_ratio.description: Ratio of exterior window area to exterior wall area.
